'''Notes'''
This laptop previously run 11.10 and suspend didn't work. Now after fresh install of Precise Pengolin everything works fine. Jockey shows that there are proprietary drivers available drivers for wifi are available for it works without them. Battery life is amazing as you can use it for 4 hours on the move. 
Function key that work:
* touchapd disable
* brightness
* wolume 
* mute 
* sleep
* battery info
Key that don't work:
* disable wifi
* turbo

Laptop doesn't have multimedia keys like play or pause for music player. Web cam has low resolution of 640x480 but works fine out of the box. 
glxgears reports 59.747 FPS
